_comment: styled-french-audio-clean-verified audio file names - last edit Oct 17 1pm
styled-french-audio-clean-verified audio file names added fr graphics - last edit Oct 20 11:30 am

bubbles.bubbleContent: How does it feel when you can’t share a picture you really like?
Let’s visit Sasha as she’s putting up today’s pictures.
HEY SIS YOU COMING TO UNISAURUS REALMS?
YEAH WHEN IM DONE POSTING MY PICTURES
Let's see what’s good enough to go up on my photo wall today.
Not that one…
That’s fun, but Violet would kill me…
Oh, I have to post that one, or else nobody will believe I made that shot.
I wonder if Max will mind me putting that up. Maybe I should ask him before I post it…

pages.e_1_1_r_1: Max is in the picture too.
pages.e_1_1_r_2: There might be some reason I don’t know that Max wouldn’t want people to see the picture.
pages.e_1_1_r_3: You should ask someone before posting a picture of them.
pages.e_1_1_r_4: I really want people to see this picture of me.
pages.e_1_1_r_5: I can’t think of any reason why Max wouldn’t want people to see the picture.
pages.e_1_1_r_6: I should get to decide who sees a picture with me in it.
pages.correctSortFeedback: Good job! You've sorted out the reasons why Sasha might choose to ask Max before posting the photo or post it without asking him.
pages.purpleBoxText: Drag the reasons why she should ask Max before posting the photo to the left side of the screen and the reasons why she might post the photo without asking him to the right.
pages.correctSortPurpleText: Click on “Ask Max First” to have Sasha ask Max before posting the photo, or click on “Post This Photo” to have her post it without asking.
pages.correctSortPurpleTextVI: Press 1 to have Sasha ask Max before posting the photo, or press 2 to have her post it without asking him.
pages.helpContent1: Max is Sasha’s friend. What are the reasons that show that she’s thinking about what’s best for him? Put those with “Ask Max First.”
pages.helpContent2: Sasha really wants to post the photo. What are the reasons why she thinks it might be okay to post it without asking him first? Put those with “Post This Photo.”

bubbles.bubbleContent: IS IT OK IF I POST THIS ON PIXONE
LET ME SEE IT
OK HERE IT IS
PLEASE DON’T POST IT
Y NOT?
JUST PLZ DONT K?
I don’t want to get Max mad at me. But I really do want people to see me make that goal…

pages.e_1_1_r_1: Max didn’t say why I shouldn’t post the photo.
pages.e_1_1_r_2: I really want people to see this photo.
pages.e_1_1_r_3: This photo doesn’t make Max look bad.
pages.e_1_1_r_4: Max asked me not to post it.
pages.e_1_1_r_5: I don’t want to hurt Max’s feelings.
pages.e_1_1_r_6: I don’t want to get Max mad at me.
pages.correctSortFeedback: Good job! You've sorted out the reasons why Sasha might decide not to post the photo or go ahead and post it anyway.
pages.purpleBoxText: Drag the reasons why she should post the photo to the left side of the screen. Drag the reasons why she might decide not to post it to the right side of the screen.
pages.correctSortPurpleText: Now click one of the two choices to decide where the story goes.
pages.correctSortPurpleTextVI: Press 1 to have Sasha not post the photo, or press 2 to have her post it.
pages.helpContent1: Max is Sasha’s friend. What are the reasons that show that she’s thinking about what’s best for him? Put those with “Ask Max First.”
pages.helpContent2: Sasha really wants to post the photo. What are the reasons why she thinks it might be okay to post it without asking him first? Put those with “Post This Photo.”

bubbles.bubbleContent: I guess if Max really doesn’t want me to post it then I won’t.
I really want my Mom to see the picture though. I know she wanted to be there…
I’ll just send it to her. That way she can see it but nobody else will.

pages.e_1_1_r_1: I really want my Mom to see that goal I made today.
pages.e_1_1_r_2: If I send the photo straight to my Mom nobody else will see it.
pages.e_1_1_r_3: Max will probably never find out I sent it to my Mom.
pages.e_1_1_r_4: Max didn’t want me to show the photo to anybody.
pages.e_1_1_r_5: I made a promise to Max and I should keep it.
pages.e_1_1_r_6: It’s not right to share pictures of people if they don’t want you to.
pages.correctSortFeedback: Good job! You've sorted out the reasons why Sasha might send the photo to her Mom or decide not to send it.
pages.purpleBoxText: Drag the reasons why Sasha might send it to her Mom to the left side of the screen and the reasons why she might not send it to the right.
pages.correctSortPurpleText: Now click one of the two choices to decide where the story goes.
pages.correctSortPurpleTextVI: Press 1 to have Sasha send the photo to her Mom, or press 2 if you think she shouldn’t send it.
pages.helpContent1: Max is Sasha’s friend. What are the reasons that show that she’s thinking about what’s best for him? Put those with “Ask Max First.”
pages.helpContent2: Sasha really wants to post the photo. What are the reasons why she thinks it might be okay to post it without asking him first? Put those with “Post This Photo.”

bubbles.bubbleContent: I know Mom would want to see this.
DID U GET THE PIC I SENT?
I’M SO PROUD! CAN I SHOW THIS TO MY FRIENDS?
I guess Max won’t mind if my Mom’s friends see it.
SURE MOM
THANKS SWEETIE!
Later…
That’s funny, Violet said to meet her in the Quest Realm but I can’t find her.
HOW COULD U? I ASKD U NOT TO SHARE IT
NOW IM GROUNDED!
Oh, no! I never meant to get Max in trouble!
What can I do to make it better?

pages.e_1_1_r_1: Max doesn’t want anyone to see the photo.
pages.e_1_1_r_2: I’d like to do something that will really help Max.
pages.e_1_1_r_3: If I delete the photo, maybe nobody else can see it.
pages.e_1_1_r_4: Max is really mad at me.
pages.e_1_1_r_5: It’s my fault Max is in trouble.
pages.e_1_1_r_6: I feel really bad for hurting Max’s feelings.
pages.correctSortFeedback: Good job! You've sorted out the reasons why Sasha might delete the photo or tell Max she’s sorry.
pages.purpleBoxText: Drag the reasons why Sasha might delete the photo to the left side of the screen and the reasons why she say she’s sorry to Max to the right.
pages.correctSortPurpleText: Now click one of the two choices to decide where the story goes.
pages.correctSortPurpleTextVI: Press 1 to have Sasha delete the photo, or press 2 to have her tell Max she’s sorry
pages.helpContent1: Is deleting the photo going to make things better for Max or Sasha? Move the reasons for thinking that it will to “Delete the Photo.”
pages.helpContent2: Is it more important for Sasha to tell Max that she’s sorry for getting him in trouble? Move the reasons for thinking that it is to “Tell Max I’m Sorry.”

HOW COULD U? I ASKD U NOT TO SHARE IT
NOW IM GROUNDED!
Oh, no! I never meant to get Max in trouble!
What can I do to make it better?

bubbles.bubbleContent: I really would like my Mom to see that picture. She’d be so proud to see me kicking that goal…
But Max really didn’t want anyone to see this, so I guess I should just delete it.
Well, maybe somebody else took a picture.

pages.e_1_6_w_1: You’ve reached ending 1 of 3. Sasha decided not to share the photo with anybody. How do you think she felt about what she did?
pages.e_1_6_w_2: How do you think Max felt about it?

bubbles.bubbleContent: I don’t see what Max is so worried about.
Just because I got that goal past him, it doesn’t make him look bad.
Max never goes on Pixone anyway. He’ll never know I posted it.

pages.e_1_1_r_1: I want everyone to see that goal I made.
pages.e_1_1_r_2: My Mom would want all her friends to be able to see the picture.
pages.e_1_1_r_3: It doesn’t matter if people I don’t know see the picture.
pages.e_1_1_r_4: Only the people I know need to see the picture.
pages.e_1_1_r_5: If a lot of people see the picture, Max is probably going to find out I shared it.
pages.e_1_1_r_6: Only my friends would want to see the picture anyway.
pages.correctSortFeedback: Good job! You've sorted out the reasons why Sasha might share the photo with everyone or just with her friends.
pages.purpleBoxText: Drag the reasons why Sasha might share it with everyone to the left side of the screen and the reasons why she might only share it with her friends to the right.
pages.correctSortPurpleText: Now click one of the two choices to decide where the story goes.
pages.correctSortPurpleTextVI: Press 1 to have Sasha share the photo with everyone, or press 2 to have her share it with just her friends.
pages.helpContent1: What are the reasons why Sasha would want as many people as possible to see the picture? Put them with “Share With Everyone.”
pages.helpContent2: What are the reasons why Sasha would want to make sure that not too many people see the picture? Put them with “Share With Just My Friends.”

Max really didn’t want me to share it, though… maybe there’s a way I can just let some of my friends see it?
Hey, I bet Aadan would know!
HEY AADAN!
YEAH WHATS UP?
DO U KNOW HOW I CAN LET JUST SOME PPL SEE A PIC?
SURE
PULL DOWN THE MENU THAT SAYS EVERYONE
AND PICK THE ONE U WANT
COOL THX
JUST REMEMBER ANYONE U SHARE WITH CAN SHARE IT 2
OK THX

bubbles.bubbleContent: I know, I’ll delete the photo so no one else can see it.
I DELETED THE PIC
YOU DELETED YOUR COPY
BUT OTHER PEOPLE STILL HAVE COPIES OF IT
Oh no, I didn’t think of that!
I guess all I can do is apologize.
IM REALLY SORRY!

pages.e_1_6_w_1: You’ve reached ending 2 of 3. Sasha’s friend Max didn’t want anyone to see that picture. Sasha decided to delete it – but not until after people had seen it. How do you think Sasha felt about how things turned out?
pages.e_1_6_w_2: How do you think Max felt about it?

bubbles.bubbleContent: Max’s mom has already seen the picture, so all I can do is say I’m sorry….
HEY MAX IM REALLY SORRY
I DIDNT THINK U WOULD GET IN TROUBLE
I KNOW U DIDN’T
IM IN TROUBLE CUZ I WAS AT THE GAME
NOT BECAUSE U SHARED THE PIC
WHAT CAN I DO TO HELP?
IM OK… JUST BORED CUZ I CANT GO OUT
WANT TO PLAY UNISAURUS REALMS?

pages.e_1_6_w_1: You’ve reached ending 3 of 3. Sasha decided to say she was sorry to Max for sharing the picture. How do you think she felt about it?
